data.eml:eml: Taxonomic identity of the ghost ant, Tapinoma melanocephalum (Fabricius, 1793) (Formicidae: Dolichoderinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guerrero, Roberto J. (2018): Taxonomic identity of the ghost ant, Tapinoma melanocephalum (Fabricius, 1793) (Formicidae: Dolichoderinae). Zootaxa 4410 (3): 497-510, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.3.4
